abstract.t: This document defines an HTTPS based transport layer for use with the MIMI Protocol. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Discussion of this document takes place on the More Instant Messaging Interoperability Working Group mailing list (mimi@ietf.org), which is archived at https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/browse/mimi/. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/kkohbrok/mimi-transport.
